text: Abdul Mahdi Hadi (, 26 February 1946 – 26 September 2020) was an Iraqi coach and international football player. He also played for Al-Minaa from 1966 to 1978.History of Iraqi Sports, 1970 (in Arabic) He played for the national team in 1970. He was born in Basra, Iraq. Hadi died on 26 September 2020 in Basra from COVID-19 at the age of 74.وفاة الاعب الدولي السابق عبد المهدي هادي بسبب اصابته بكورونا ==References== ==Other websites== * Iraqi national team players database *Al-Minaa Club: Sailors of south Category:1946 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Iraqi footballers Category:Iraqi football managers Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Iraq
title: Abdul Mahdi Hadi
